name: kiro-copilot-extension
description: A VSCode extension that adds Kiro-style Vibe Coding and Spec modes to GitHub Copilot

commands.title: Kiro: Switch to Vibe Coding Mode
Kiro: Start Task from Current File

enumDescriptions: Vibe Coding - Chat first, then build. Explore ideas and iterate as you discover needs.
Spec - Plan first, then build. Create requirements and design before coding starts.

kiroCopilot.promptsPath.description: Custom path to prompts directory. Leave empty to use default locations (extension prompts → user prompts → workspace .kiro/prompts)

kiroCopilot.autoDetectTasks.description: Automatically scan workspace for tasks.md files and show them in Task Context view

kiroCopilot.specsDirectory.description: Directory where spec folders are stored (relative to workspace root)

kiroCopilot.steeringDirectory.description: Directory where steering files are stored (relative to workspace root)

kiroCopilot.taskScanDepth.description: Maximum directory depth to scan for tasks.md files

kiroCopilot.enableLogging.description: Enable detailed logging to the Output panel for debugging

kiroCopilot.taskStatusIcons.description: VS Code icon IDs for different task statuses

enumDescriptions: GPT-4o - Most capable model for complex tasks
GPT-3.5 Turbo - Faster, good for simple tasks
kiroCopilot.defaultLanguageModel.description: Preferred language model for @kiro chat participant

kiroCopilot.showModeInStatusBar.description: Show current coding mode in the status bar

kiroCopilot.autoRefreshTaskContext.description: Automatically refresh Task Context view when tasks.md files change

kiroCopilot.excludePatterns.description: Glob patterns to exclude when scanning for tasks.md files

chatParticipants.name: kiro
chatParticipants.description: Kiro-style AI assistant with Vibe and Spec modes

commands.name: vibe
commands.description: Switch to Vibe Coding mode - rapid exploration and testing

commands.name: spec
commands.description: Switch to Spec mode - plan requirements and design first

commands.name: task
commands.description: Start working on a task from tasks.md

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
